TextView.android:text: Hello. Welcome to your blog! If your look to the top left, you'll see the menu button. Here you can chose to go to your home page, to search posts or to make a new post. Every post has a title, description and a date. You can chose these yourself. However beware that once your post is posted on het main page, you can not delete it! You can also not delete other peoples posts. So enjoy your blog and keep posting daily!
